title: Donald Glover’s Amazon Deal and a Temperature Check on ‘WandaVision’
description:
Chris and Andy talk about how Donald Glover’s eight-figure deal with Amazon might impact the streaming landscape (1:00). Then, they talk briefly about ‘The Knick’ and ‘Banshee’ being added to HBO Max (19:23), before getting into the latest episode of ‘WandaVision’ (27:52).

Hosts: Chris Ryan and Andy Greenwald
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
